00047 static __inline
00048 mpc_uint32_t mpc_swap32(mpc_uint32_t val) {
00049     return (((val & 0xff000000) >> 24) | ((val & 0x00ff0000) >> 8) |
00050             ((val & 0x0000ff00) <<  8) | ((val & 0x000000ff) << 24));
00051 }
